An HIV1 RNA plasma titer > = 5000 copies/ml within 1421 day prior baseline visit . CD4 cell count > = 100 cells/mm3 within 1421 day prior baseline visit . A minimum life expectancy least 1 year . Signed , inform consent parent legal guardian patient < 18 year age .
